chenya.components.Banner.title: Domestic New Fan Will Come Out
chenya.components.Banner.subtitle: the glory of Taiwan
chenya.components.Highlight.fstMessage: Each can be independent maintenance, do not have all downtime, high operating efficiency, maintenance can reduce project risk.
chenya.components.Highlight.secMessage: Operating efficiency than traditional wind turbines increased by about 30% -40%.
chenya.components.Highlight.thirdMessage: Modular production can reduce manufacturing costs.
chenya.components.Heading.title: 新型渦輪風力發電機
chenya.components.Heading.subtitle: Implement the application of national green energy industry and enhance national competitiveness
chenya.components.post.subtitle1: Offshore wind power is far from land. Residents are not affected by noise and light and shadow problems and land development on land is reduced.
chenya.components.post.subtitle2: Large and stable winds at sea, quiet period less, not only to capture the wind power and generating efficiency increases.
chenya.components.post.subtitle3: The construction of offshore wind power can make the local unique local characteristics, driving the crowd and enhance employment opportunities.
chenya.components.post.subtitle4: Wind power is an endless stream of green energy that is non-polluting and of great environmental benefits, reducing dependence on fossil fuels.
chenya.containers.AboutPage.introHeader: 電廠級新型渦輪風力發電機
chenya.containers.AboutPage.introContent: Cheng Ye Engineering Consultants Co., Ltd was founded in 2017. Authorized wind turbine generator system patent, broad knowledge in integrating solar and wind energy, energy-saving equipment, energy storage system, specially considered wind energy over Taiwan ocean convection and developed the more productive wind turbine generator system, also the integrating services of related light and wind energy.
chenya.components.TTWindSection.desc1: stacking or combinational design get better performances
chenya.components.TTWindSection.desc2: wind impact noises reduced to quiet level
chenya.components.TTWindSection.desc3: aseismic and anti-turbulence structure reduces nature disaster loss
chenya.components.TTWindSection.desc4: 360-degree intake steel structure captures winds from all directions, avoid wind disaster loss, the output not weakened, reduce the maintenance resource loss
chenya.components.GreenEnergy.header: Green Energy System Integration And Planning
chenya.components.HybridSystemSection.he: Hybrid Wind/Solar Power Lighting System & Hybrid Wind/Solar Power Monitoring System
chenya.containers.FeaturePage.compareHea: 新型渦輪風力發電機與傳統風機之比較
chenya.containers.FeaturePage.t1r2c2: 運轉極靜音，約35分貝以內。
chenya.containers.FeaturePage.t1r3c2: 全鋼骨建構可抗強烈颱風，受天災引響度小，可堆疊架設單位面積效率高，機體成本低，製造可模組化放大規格。
chenya.containers.FeaturePage.t1r4c2: 模組化生產可降低製造成本。
chenya.containers.FeaturePage.t1r5c2: 不需特殊高空重吊機具，安裝時受天候影響較小。
chenya.containers.FeaturePage.t1r6c2: 每部可獨立維修保養 ，不必全部停機，營運效率高，維護可降低工程風險。
chenya.containers.FeaturePage.t1r7c2: 運轉效率比傳統式風力機提高約30%-40%。
chenya.containers.FeaturePage.t1r8c2: 風塔間效率互相增加可採陣列式，舊電廠或停用燃煤電廠，只要風量符合要求，可轉為此型風力電廠。
chenya.containers.FeaturePage.t1r9c2: 風機間隔為直徑的一半，後排風機可部置於二機之間，造成一片風牆，完全吸納風量。
chenya.containers.FeaturePage.t1r10c2: 可調式閘門、可集風、可抗超強風，對風量可大部分使用。依風速不同自動增壓、減壓、關閉，提高功率及安全性。依風向不同自動尋風工作，增加效能。
chenya.containers.FeaturePage.t1r11c2: 渦輪機發電功率每平方公尺約500瓦，Cp值約60%。
chenya.containers.ContactPage.company: Cheng Ye Engineering Consultants Co., Ltd
chenya.containers.ContactPage.addrCont: 12F., No.91-3, Zhongshan 2nd Rd., Qianzhen Dist., Kaohsiung City 806, Taiwan (R.O.C.)
